name: forms-md
description: FormsMD is a self-hosted Markdown-based form builder. It turns MD-like syntax into shareable forms with submissions tracked via a lightweight backend, making it ideal for simple surveys or feedback collection without external dependencies.
features: Forms: Markdown-based form builder, Simple syntax, Submission tracking. Easy survey creation.
Self-Hosted: No external services. Complete privacy.
Feedback Collection: Perfect for simple surveys. Quick setup.
Markdown Syntax: Write forms in plain text. Developer-friendly.
Submission Management: View and export responses. Data control.
Email Notifications: Get alerted of submissions. Stay informed.
Custom Styling: Personalize form appearance. Your brand.
API Access: Integrate with tools. Automation-ready.
